cab.content: TS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY1S GOVERNMENT..RET. fciCopy No._LP. 309(31).CABINET.PRODUCTION AND EXPORTS TO THE UNITED KINGDOM OFWHEAT AMD FLOUR *Memorandum "by the President of the Board of Trade.At their Meeting held on Wednesday, 2nd December, 1931, the Cabinet asked me to circulate a statement showing "particulars of the sources from which our supplie s of wheat and flour have been obtained during the last ten years. The figures should include, in addition, the total wheat production of the various countries from which supplies are drawn". Cabinet Conclusions 84(31), 2(6)^7The tables appended give information as to:-(l) Imports of wheat and of flour into the United Kingdom in 1930 distinguishing chief sources of supply. (Table I).(2) Crop production in, total exports from, and imports into tne United Kingdom from the principal sources of supply in 1930. (Table IIA - Wheat). (Table IIB - Flour). The above information is shown separately for convenience of reference. It relates only to 1930 and is repeated in table III.(3) Crop production in, total exports of wheat and of flour from, and imports into the United Kingdom from the principal sources of supply in each of the past ten years.Board of Trade,7th December, 1931.
